Newsletter Thank You Message.other: Thank you for subscribing! Also, check us out on Instagram at [@reimanorthamerica](https://www.instagram.com/reimanorthamerica/)!

Newsletter TOS Consent.other: I have read and accept [terms of service](/pages/terms-of-service) and [privacy policy](/pages/privacy-policy)

SEO Description.other: Reima is the globally leading brand in functional & outdoor kids clothing providing quality, year-around, clothes designed specifically for active children. Everything from fleece coats, to full down jackets, clothing for skiing and everything in between. Discover the joy of movement!

Newsletter Title.other: Sign up and save 10% off your first purchase

Newsletter Text.other: Reima Friends are the first to know about our latest products, exclusive offers and top tips. Your coupon will be be emailed to you.

Newsletter Marketing Consent.other: Yes, I would like to receive Reima Club newsletter to my email, and get access to my account on reima.com
